name: Wynnwood Knights: The Next Generation
description:
Evil has once again reared its ugly head in the land of Wynnwood. It is up to four young heroes to right the wrongs and bring order and peace back to the land.

When the Prince is kidnapped, the King tasks you with bringing him back. 

Traverse through forests, mountains, caves, rivers, seas, and even by air!! 

Battle fierce monsters and the elements in your quest to rescue the Prince from the clutches of Evil. 

Developed, written, and imagined by Nova Kane Inc. 2020.
